DOC.brief_title: A Trial Evaluating Clinical Applicability , Correlation , Modeling Cardiac CT Using 64 Detector Row VCT
DOC.criteria: Patients schedule elective diagnostic catheterization OR Elective diagnostic catheterization perform within past 2 week less 24 hour prior coronary CTA procedure intervention perform change patient clinical status . Age ≥18 year ≤75 year . Prior coronary stent implantation Prior coronary artery bypass graft heart surgery Prior pacemaker internal defibrillator lead implantation Prior artificial heart valve Biochemical renal insufficiency ( CrSerum > 1.6 ) dialysis Resting HR > 100 time enrollment Contraindication βblockade calcium channel blocker NYHAIV Highgrade atrioventricular ( AV ) block Systolic blood pressure < 90 mm Hg Severe asthma active bronchospasm and/or chronic obstructive pulmonary disease Atrial fibrillation Inability provide inform consent Evidence ongoing active clinical instability Acute chest pain ( sudden onset ) Acute myocardial infarction Cardiac shock Acute pulmonary edema
